title: Raw Chocolate Snaps

ingredients.content: 200 g raw cacao butter, cut in pieces (1-2 cm), plus extra for greasing
40 g hazelnuts, toasted and roughly chopped
½ orange, zest only, no white pith
40 g macadamia nuts, toasted and roughly chopped

preparations.content: Grease and line 2 small baking trays with baking paper and set aside. Thoroughly clean and dry mixing bowl.

Place cacao butter in mixing bowl and chop <b>20 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then melt <b>10-14 min/37°C/speed 1<b>, or until completely melted. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add all remaining ingredients and warm <b>10 min/37°C/speed 1<b>.
Blend chocolate <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>, then pour half of the chocolate mixture onto each of the prepared baking trays.
Scatter hazelnuts, orange zest and salt over chocolate on 1 of the baking trays. Set aside in freezer to set (approx. 30 minutes).
Scatter macadamias and coconut over chocolate on remaining baking tray. Place into the freezer to set (approx. 30 minutes).
When chocolate has set, break into pieces and serve.

hintsAndTricks: Raw chocolate snaps need to be stored in a sealable container in the fridge or in a freezable container in the freezer.
